metadata.synopsis: One-liner with an enthralled guard in Guard Tower in Cazador's Palace.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookGo To Region - Act 3 - LOW - Cazador's Palace - Guard Towerclimb the scaffolding and enter the towerconvince the guard that you belong hereuse the ladder to get to the next flooruse the stairs to get to the next floorclick on the NPC

0.speaker: Reklan
0.text: Tonight is a sacred night. We are all blessed to be here.

1.speaker: Reklan
1.text: You must hurry - the master expects all children at the ritual.

2.speaker: Reklan
2.text: The time is almost upon us.
